overview.en: Mirror Protocol (MIR) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Mirror Protocol has a current supply of 370,575,000 with 47,873,356.074394 in circulation. The last known price of Mirror Protocol is 6.89559577 USD and is down -2.97 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 17 active market(s) with $15,282,278.77 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://mirror.finance.
